string.name: longstr_guide
string.Data:
1. The purpose of the XyTodo 
 
 1.1 XyTodo has been designed to manage your to-do list, and as an open source software, it provides a case for beginners to learn application development. Source code, please refer to Github.
 
 2. The data of XyTodo 
 
 2.1 XyTodo has not yet supported synchronization, and this feature will be added in future releases.

string.name: longstr_contact_us
string.Data:
We very glad that you have experienced XyTodo, if you encounter any problems in the use of welcome you to contact us at any time.
 Now you can send an email to kulics@naxy.me, or view our twitter https://twitter.com/KulicsWu to get in touch with us, we will listen to you and help you solve the problem.
 XyTodo very much need your valuable advice to support our improvement, I hope XyTodo can grow up with you, to become one of your most powerful tool.
